name: developer-roadmap
description: Comprehensive developer learning plugin covering 65+ technology roadmaps from roadmap.sh. Includes specialized agents for Frontend, Backend, Mobile, DevOps, AI/Data, Programming, and Architecture with 30+ skills and interactive learning paths.
author: Plugin Agent Marketplace

agents.name: Frontend Development Agent
agents.description: Expert in React, Vue, Angular, TypeScript, and modern web technologies

agents.name: Backend Development Agent
agents.description: Specialist in API design, Node.js, Spring Boot, databases, and server-side development

agents.name: Mobile Development Agent
agents.description: Expert in Android, iOS, React Native, and Flutter mobile development

agents.name: DevOps & Infrastructure Agent
agents.description: Specialist in Docker, Kubernetes, AWS, Terraform, and CI/CD automation

agents.name: AI & Data Science Agent
agents.description: Expert in machine learning, AI agents, data engineering, and analytics

agents.name: Programming Languages Agent
agents.description: Expert in Python, Java, Go, Rust, C++, and computer science fundamentals

agents.name: Architecture & Management Agent
agents.description: Specialist in software architecture, system design, security, and engineering leadership
